response.overview: South of Nowhere is a teen drama that follows Spencer Carlin, a Midwestern girl who moves with her conservative family to Los Angeles. As she navigates a new school and city, Spencer begins to question her identity, values, and sexualityâ€”especially after forming a deep connection with the rebellious and free-spirited Ashley Davies. The series explores themes of love, family, self-discovery, and acceptance, tackling real-life issues such as race, religion, and LGBTQ+ identity with emotional depth and authenticity.
response.tagline: Where do you stand when everything changes?
response.title: South of Nowhere
